content: cheddar is a goldfish cat toy yes that kind of goldfish the ones pepperidge farm makes he is without ornamentation for kitty safety felted for durability and filled with catnip he is a super easy knit made in one piece and requiring only knowledge of knit and purl increase and decrease please feel free to attach a stick and string to cheddar if you would prefer one of those fishing type cat toys gauge is listed pre-felting other notions needed darning needle sewing needle matching thread catnip 5-10 grams
